comments:
I am creating 2 TD axis 2 web services.  First one is created into Proj1 and it runs through without problems.  Now I try to create the second web service into Proj2 (I ensured the project showing on the first page is Proj2).  When I click finish I get the following message:

IWAB0164E Cannot create the file "build.xml" relative to the path "/Proj1" because automatic file overwriting has not been enabled. Do you want to enable it for this file?

Notice the project in the message is */Proj1* instead of /Proj2.  If I proceed I will run into an exception saying that /Proj2/resources folder does not exist (full error included below).  My wsdl is copied to /Proj1/resources instead.

Also please note this screnario is found with axis2 1.1.1.  I am not able try this scenario on axis2 1.2 because bug 184729 is blocking TD scenario in axis2 1.2.

Exception occured while file read wrote

This problem only shows up for top-down Axis2 scenarios.  Generating bottom-up and client Axis2 Web services into different projects are fine.

Created an attachment (id=65894)
fix for the Bug 184740

tested and verified. 

Please review and commit. 

Thanks 

Lahiru
Patch reviewed, tested and committed.  Released to HEAD as v200705071817.
verified and with the latest source update ...Closing the issue
